layout: post title: JS单体模式 date: 2015-11-13 10:47:45

categories: js-mode

方式一：

function Universe(){
    var instance;

    //
    Universe = function(){
        return instance;            
    }

    //
    Universe.prototype = this; 

    instance = new Universe();

    instance.constructor = Universe;

    instance.start_time = 0;
    instance.bang = "Big";
    return instance;
}

方式二：

var Universe2;
(function(){ 
    var instance;
    Universe = function(){
        if(instance){
            return instance;
        }
        instance = this;
        this.start_time = 0;
        this.bang = "big";
    }
}());
